## Public Member Functions

### getAnalysisUsage() {#a4694a636db811386299d0db5acb8bcf8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LCSSA.cpp&#125;::LCSSAWrapperPass::getAnalysisUsage (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysisusage">AnalysisUsage</a> &amp; AU) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
This transformation requires natural loop information &amp; requires that loop preheaders be inserted into the CFG.

It maintains both of these, as well as the CFG. It also requires dominator information.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/lcssa-cpp/#l00511">511</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/lcssa-cpp">LCSSA.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
